descriptionHtml:
Simple way to fix Dark face forehead bug

follow instruction\'s


1 Open creation kit

2 Load Master/Plugin file Double click (Skyrim.esm) so you get an X in box on left (\"Do Not Set As Active\") Then click OK.

3 Click yes to all on all error BS.

4 Select your character you have the bug with Right click edit.

5 Scroll accross to (Character Gen Parts).

6 Select FemaleUpperEyeSocket.dds Or MaleUpperEyeSocket.dds.

7 Click full or head preview at bottom so you can see what it does and zoom into your face.

8 Set Interpolation value to 0 and Click the preview again so u can see the change :)

9 click ok And the highlight the character again and press Ctrl + F4 click ok.

10 Goto file save and name your new plugin and save it
   Launch your game and make sure your newly created  .esp is active.

 mines at bottom of my load order and works fine Enjoy. :)

If it\'s been covered before my bad but i could\'nt find it.
author: Amberleaf779
